버그가 많긴 하지만 금방 금방 고쳐 줍니다. 데바데는 처음에 하면 굉장히 무섭지만, 나중에 가면 재밌어요. 초보자들은 살인마 하지 마시고, 생존자를 하세요. 근데 살인마도 해봐야 살인마 퍽을 알 수 있고, 대처 방법도 알 수 있으니 아예 안할수는 없어요. 즐거운 데바데 하세요.

O balanceamento está totalmente desequilibrado para favorecer os killers, e o jogo se torna cada vez mais injogável para os sobreviventes, deveriam fazer um tutorial sobre as bençãos para os novatos, pois eles simplesmente quebram todos totems antes que alguma benção possa ser ativada, e tudo que favorece os sobreviventes é nerfado constantemente.
无语子，免费上门修机还要被砸背，轮班也很辛苦，蘑菇也晃眼睛，但是我的职业操守让我坚持完成了任务！还带了土特产送给农场主，他说红齿轮很好用，维修快质量好。就是希望下次农场主不要再带剁手了。其实农场主虽然看起来凶，心地还是很善良的，请我吃我最爱的苹果，好耶
答应我，别再守尸了，好么？

这个小厂的小破游戏大概是我坚持最久也最不会放弃的一款游戏了，看到从特别好评到最近的褒贬不一，心里挺不是滋味的。
官方确实做了些不尽人意的更新（对，说的就是你，娘炮撒手，技能像个低配挼比不说，画风直接就和整个游戏格格不入了，倒是也不排除官方想向这个方向发展的可能性），但这个小厂真的让我感受到了是一群热爱游戏的人在工作，而不像那些圈钱游戏的黑心厂商做游戏只为了钱。不断的模型材质更新，平衡性更新，甚至还有人物动作更新（虽然这也褒贬不一），（还有被诟病的ui更新），全都是免费的，大家都在希望这个游戏变得更好，同时不断更新也导致不犯错是不可能的，像前段时间的刀气和ui这样严重的问题官方也会很快解决。
好吧并不是很快，并且还存在着很多小问题。
不过大伙想想，解决问题需要什么，钱啊！再热爱也要吃饭的啊！那些手游里氪的一次648还不一定能出一个角色，在这游戏里就够买游戏+全dlc+好多皮肤+无限古书了吧，二十多块两个角色，还经常打折，这点钱很难办事啊
说了这么多，就是希望各位能多理解理解官方，多点耐心，少点戾气（一个个戾气这么重，猎杀戾气也不见你们带啊）
Puede mejorar pero los balances siendo killer son malos,mucho gen rush,aun asi lo recomiendo

Fuck. This. Game. Dead by Daylight is one of the worst and best games I've ever had the displeasure of spending great sums of money on. For those of you who actually read the reviews to understand what type of game you are about to get then please take the time to listen to me. This game isn't going to be as fun as you think it will be for various reasons, The community is one of the most hypocritical and toxic cesspits you could ever be a part of and the game is almost always fundamentally broken on every patch and major update even though they have a PTB (Public Test Beta) for every mid-chapter patch or major update they release. The only reason I have so much time on this game is because I got it at the start of the pandemic and I had nothing other to do sense I graduated in March. This game is easy to get tilted in and I do have anger issues so that could make me biased, But the absolute amount of times this game has just taken a major shit on me because the devs are so incompetent that they update tons of things that no one even asked for while leaving the major hitbox issues in the game for not goddamn reason its easy to get a little heated every once and a while. Don't get me wrong, this game can be fun to newer and older players, but all the bullshit with every update and the lack of care from the devs for the community of the game is just so fucking bad that id rather play Rainbow six Siege than this, because with siege I know that the game is stacked against me at all times. The main game play of Dead by Daylight is not what the trailer makes you think. In the beginning this game was supposed to be a sort of hide and seek type of game where the survivors and killer played a sort of cat and mouse dynamic, but the game is now to where the majority of the survivor and killer mains are just full on egotistical assholes that have no sense of decency or respect for any other person. Dead by Daylights is also a game that is ranked at all times (you start at rank 20 and go down to 1 after you meet certain requirements after matches) but the ranking system doesn't work and you as a rank 20 survivor can get paired against a rank 6 killer with 900 hours in the game who knows everything about the killer hes playing. I know this review makes it seem like I fully hate Dead by Daylight but I still like the concept and story of the killers and survivors, I truly do believe that this game can be great and that it has potential to be something amazing, but I truly can't recommend this game if you have any type of anger related problems or if you aren't going to play this with friends. I know being a survivor doesn't sound that fun to most people but playing as the killer is awful at almost every point, mainly because survivors in ranks past 16 shouldn't be scared of the killer, playing killer takes lots of skill and is for the people who think that have what it takes to destroy teams of talented survivors, which isn't that bad of a thing but the game has so many bugs and hit box issues at all times that it is just bs half the time you play. Another issue with the game is that its balancing (in my opinion) is survivor sided to the highest extent, and the newest killers and being made to ignore one of the main things survivors can do to keep themselves alive and safe. I have many other things I can bring up and complain about but I think I've said my peace. also I'm not the best at writing and typing and I know my grammar is shit but if you can understand the basic argument then you don't need to make a big deal is something is punctuated wrong or if a word is spelled incorrectly. If anyone has any questions to my thoughts or wants anymore input to my thoughts on this game then feel free to comment on this review or to just comment on my steam profile. Now if you will excuse me I'm off to play more of this game because  its about as addicting as crack cocaine.

"O jogo tem a jogabilidade legal, mas ainda tem que melhorar muito em questão de balanceamento de habilidades, animações e hit box... de resto o jogo é interessante"

(esta era minha opinião faz uns 3 ou 4 anos atrás)

Agora depois de vários "balanceamentos" o jogo ficou muito podre... ao invés de melhorar só fez piorar.
O que era pra ser um jogo divertido agora se tornou muito estressante. A empresa só visa um lado dos jogadores enquanto o outro só se fode... mexe em coisa que não deveria e nas que deveria nem chega a fazer mudança. Parabéns pelo jogo merda.

Game that immensely favours the killer, if a killer persists and sweats enough they will almost always guaranteed a victory for themselves through aggressive means. 

All the dead by daylight die hard simps who would defend the game, they themselves all run a very particular build or mostly similiar build to one another to counter overly aggressive killers. They are essentially exploiting perks and forming squads with the perk exploits in mind.

You have incredibly short sighted team members that will unintentionally bait you and other survivors when being unhooked, only to be immediately downed again and put on the very same hook again.

Team members that often will focus on messing about with the killer rather then prioritising generators.

Game is unfair and unbalanced, whichever side you play the other side has the advantage. The grind is so ridiculous to get the perks you need in order to be good and when you do get the perks you want the other side still finds a way to bully you. Can't stop playing, I'm having the time of my life 10/10 would recommend.

그외에 게임성은 진짜 재밌다. 4명이서 협동하며 누군 어그로 끌고 누군 커버를 쳐주고 누군 발전기 돌리며 합이 딱 맞을때와 어그로를 아슬아슬하게 끌면서 심리전 할때의 쾌감은 정말 재밌다. 그리고 만약 살인마를 할려면 심장을 빼고 해라 온갖 인성질에 흥분하면 살인마를 못하는 체질이다.
참고로 친구랑 막 같이한다고 다인큐 같은거 하면 얘들이 정말 화낸다. 진짜 이런거 보면 이게임은 친구랑 같이 못하는 솔로겜인가? 싶어질때가 있다.

Unbalanced, without any sense of art direction or design consistency. The reason players play it is because of simple thrills like a game of tag, but it botches it with a bunch of rudimentary, thoughtless perks and characters thrown in. Steer clear. You've been warned.

EDIT: Wanted to update to say the writing in the bits of lore you unlock for completing challenges is SO BAD I don't even want to hear it. It's irritating the way the writer(s?) repeat the same words. It's like listening to fan fiction.

At first when this game first came out i recommended it however now its just a bunch of bots/hackers. 

There is no game-play now. No fear of being hunted. No need to look over your shoulder while simultaneously focusing on the skill checks. There is no holding your breath in fear when you realize the killer is the pig who can stalk prey and sneak up on you with no warning.

Killers are using bots/hacks to just stand in place and swipe. You're literally just fixing generators and then leaving. Boring. 

Devs do better.
